name: NANA-GEDDON
description:
Some maniac decided there were too many grannies in the world. You must defuse the bomb and chuck the grannies to safety, with the help of some passing motorists.

You can play the game with a mouse and keyboard, but a gamepad is recommended. 

  • Left Stick - Movement
  • Right Stick - Aim
  • Triggers - Grab a Granny / Interact with Bomb
  • A / B / X / Y - Diffuse Bomb

If you have a keyboard and mouse you can use:

  • WASD / Arrows - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Space / Enter - Grab a Granny / Interact with Bomb
  • 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 - Diffuse Bomb

Made during the 2023 Moray Game Jam for the theme 'The first line of a novel'.

This game is based upon the book "The Crow Road" by Iain Banks.

The first line is "It was the day my grandmother exploded".
